card.name: AEther Snap
card.text: Remove all counters from all permanents and exile all tokens.

card.name: AEther Vial
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on AEther Vial. {T}: You may put a creature card with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on AEther Vial from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Ageless Entity
card.text: Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on Ageless Entity.

card.name: Angel's Feather
card.text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Arcane Spyglass
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Draw a card and put a charge counter on Arcane Spyglass. Remove three charge counters from Arcane Spyglass: Draw a card.

card.name: Arcbound Bruiser
card.text: Modular 3

card.name: Arcbound Crusher
card.text: Trample Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Arcbound Crusher. Modular 1

card.name: Arcbound Fiend
card.text: Fear At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move a +1/+1 counter from target creature onto Arcbound Fiend. Modular 3

card.name: Arcbound Hybrid
card.text: Haste Modular 2

card.name: Arcbound Lancer
card.text: First strike Modular 4

card.name: Arcbound Overseer
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature with modular you control. Modular 6

card.name: Arcbound Ravager
card.text: Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on Arcbound Ravager. Modular 1

card.name: Arcbound Reclaimer
card.text: Remove a +1/+1 counter from Arcbound Reclaimer: Put target artifact card from your graveyard on top of your library. Modular 2

card.name: Arcbound Slith
card.text: Whenever Arcbound Slith deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Modular 1

card.name: Arcbound Stinger
card.text: Flying Modular 1

card.name: Arcbound Worker
card.text: Modular 1

card.name: Auriok Glaivemaster
card.text: As long as Auriok Glaivemaster is equipped, it gets +1/+1 and has first strike.

card.name: Auriok Siege Sled
card.text: {1}: Target artifact creature blocks Auriok Siege Sled this turn if able. {1}: Target artifact creature can't block Auriok Siege Sled this turn.

card.name: Barbed Lightning
card.text: Choose one - Barbed Lightning deals 3 damage to target creature; or Barbed Lightning deals 3 damage to target player. Entwine {2}

card.name: Blinkmoth Nexus
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}: Blinkmoth Nexus becomes a 1/1 Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land. {1}, {T}: Target Blinkmoth creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Burden of Greed
card.text: Target player loses 1 life for each tapped artifact he or she controls.

card.name: Carry Away
card.text: Enchant Equipment When Carry Away enters the battlefield, unattach enchanted Equipment. You control enchanted Equipment.

card.name: Chimeric Egg
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a nonartifact spell, put a charge counter on Chimeric Egg. Remove three charge counters from Chimeric Egg: Chimeric Egg becomes a 6/6 Construct artifact creature with trample until end of turn.

card.name: Chittering Rats
card.text: When Chittering Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent puts a card from his or her hand on top of his or her library.

card.name: Chromescale Drake
card.text: Affinity for artifacts Flying When Chromescale Drake enters the battlefield, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all artifact cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Coretapper
card.text: {T}: Put a charge counter on target artifact. Sacrifice Coretapper: Put two charge counters on target artifact.

card.name: Crazed Goblin
card.text: Crazed Goblin attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Darksteel Brute
card.text: Indestructible {3}: Darksteel Brute becomes a 2/2 Beast artifact creature until end of turn.

card.name: Darksteel Citadel
card.text: Indestructible {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Darksteel Colossus
card.text: Trample, indestructible If Darksteel Colossus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Darksteel Colossus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

card.name: Darksteel Forge
card.text: Artifacts you control have indestructible.

card.name: Darksteel Ingot
card.text: Indestructible {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Darksteel Pendant
card.text: Indestructible {1}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Darksteel Reactor
card.text: Indestructible At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Darksteel Reactor. When Darksteel Reactor has twenty or more charge counters on it, you win the game.

card.name: Death Cloud
card.text: Each player loses X life, discards X cards, sacrifices X creatures, then sacrifices X lands.

card.name: Death-Mask Duplicant
card.text: Imprint - {1}: Exile target creature card from your graveyard. As long as a card exiled with Death-Mask Duplicant has flying, Death-Mask Duplicant has flying. The same is true for fear, first strike, double strike, haste, landwalk, protection, and trample.

card.name: Demon's Horn
card.text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Dismantle
card.text: Destroy target artifact. If that artifact had counters on it, put that many +1/+1 counters or charge counters on an artifact you control.

card.name: Dragon's Claw
card.text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Drill-Skimmer
card.text: Flying Drill-Skimmer has shroud as long as you control another artifact creature.

card.name: Drooling Ogre
card.text: Whenever a player casts an artifact spell, that player gains control of Drooling Ogre.

card.name: Dross Golem
card.text: Affinity for Swamps Fear

card.name: Eater of Days
card.text: Flying, trample When Eater of Days enters the battlefield, you skip your next two turns.

card.name: Echoing Calm
card.text: Destroy target enchantment and all other enchantments with the same name as that enchantment.

card.name: Echoing Courage
card.text: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Echoing Decay
card.text: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Echoing Ruin
card.text: Destroy target artifact and all other artifacts with the same name as that artifact.

card.name: Echoing Truth
card.text: Return target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent to their owners' hands.

card.name: Emissary of Despair
card.text: Flying Whenever Emissary of Despair deals combat damage to a player, that player loses 1 life for each artifact he or she controls.

card.name: Emissary of Hope
card.text: Flying Whenever Emissary of Hope deals combat damage to a player, you gain 1 life for each artifact that player controls.

card.name: Essence Drain
card.text: Essence Drain deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Fangren Firstborn
card.text: Whenever Fangren Firstborn attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking creature.

card.name: Fireball
card.text: Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players. Fireball costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.

card.name: Flamebreak
card.text: Flamebreak deals 3 damage to each creature without flying and each player. Creatures dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.

card.name: Furnace Dragon
card.text: Affinity for artifacts Flying When Furnace Dragon enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, exile all artifacts.

card.name: Gemini Engine
card.text: Whenever Gemini Engine attacks, put a colorless Construct artifact creature token named Twin onto the battlefield attacking. Its power is equal to Gemini Engine's power and its toughness is equal to Gemini Engine's toughness. Sacrifice the token at end of combat.

card.name: Genesis Chamber
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, if Genesis Chamber is untapped, that creature's controller puts a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Geth's Grimoire
card.text: Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may draw a card.

card.name: Goblin Archaeologist
card.text: {R}, {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy target artifact and untap Goblin Archaeologist. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Goblin Archaeologist.

card.name: Greater Harvester
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a permanent. Whenever Greater Harvester deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices two permanents.

card.name: Grimclaw Bats
card.text: Flying {B}, Pay 1 life: Grimclaw Bats gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Hallow
card.text: Prevent all damage target spell would deal this turn. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

card.name: Heartseeker
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+1 and has "{T}, Unattach Heartseeker: Destroy target creature." Equip {5}

card.name: Hoverguard Observer
card.text: Flying Hoverguard Observer can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Hunger of the Nim
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each artifact you control.

card.name: Infested Roothold
card.text: Defender Protection from artifacts Whenever an opponent casts an artifact spell, you may put a 1/1 green Insect creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Inflame
card.text: Inflame deals 2 damage to each creature dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Juggernaut
card.text: Juggernaut attacks each turn if able. Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

card.name: Karstoderm
card.text: Karstoderm enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield, remove a +1/+1 counter from Karstoderm.

card.name: Kraken's Eye
card.text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Krark-Clan Stoker
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Add {R}{R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Last Word
card.text: Last Word can't be countered by spells or abilities. Counter target spell.

card.name: Leonin Battlemage
card.text: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Whenever you cast a spell, you may untap Leonin Battlemage.

card.name: Leonin Bola
card.text: Equipped creature has "{T}, Unattach Leonin Bola: Tap target creature." Equip {1}

card.name: Leonin Shikari
card.text: You may activate equip abilities any time you could cast an instant.

card.name: Lich's Tomb
card.text: You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life. Whenever you lose life, sacrifice a permanent for each 1 life you lost.

card.name: Loxodon Mystic
card.text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

card.name: Machinate
card.text: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of artifacts you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Magnetic Flux
card.text: Artifact creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.

card.name: Memnarch
card.text: {1}{U}{U}: Target permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types. {3}{U}: Gain control of target artifact.

card.name: Mephitic Ooze
card.text: Mephitic Ooze gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control. Whenever Mephitic Ooze deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. The creature can't be regenerated.

card.name: Metal Fatigue
card.text: Tap all artifacts.

card.name: Mirrodin's Core
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Put a charge counter on Mirrodin's Core. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Mirrodin's Core: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Murderous Spoils
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You gain control of all Equipment that was attached to it.

card.name: Mycosynth Lattice
card.text: All permanents are artifacts in addition to their other types. All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are colorless. Players may spend mana as though it were mana of any color.

card.name: Myr Landshaper
card.text: {T}: Target land becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn.

card.name: Myr Matrix
card.text: Indestructible Myr creatures get +1/+1. {5}: Put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Myr Moonvessel
card.text: When Myr Moonvessel dies, add {C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Nemesis Mask
card.text: All creatures able to block equipped creature do so. Equip {3}

card.name: Neurok Prodigy
card.text: Flying Discard an artifact card: Return Neurok Prodigy to its owner's hand.

card.name: Neurok Transmuter
card.text: {U}: Target creature becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn. {U}: Until end of turn, target artifact creature becomes blue and isn't an artifact.

card.name: Nim Abomination
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if Nim Abomination is untapped, you lose 3 life.

card.name: Nourish
card.text: You gain 6 life.

card.name: Oxidda Golem
card.text: Affinity for Mountains Haste

card.name: Oxidize
card.text: Destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Panoptic Mirror
card.text: Imprint - {X}, {T}: You may exile an instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost X from your hand. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may copy a card exiled with Panoptic Mirror. If you do, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Pristine Angel
card.text: Flying As long as Pristine Angel is untapped, it has protection from artifacts and from all colors. Whenever you cast a spell, you may untap Pristine Angel.

card.name: Psychic Overload
card.text: Enchant permanent When Psychic Overload enters the battlefield, tap enchanted permanent. Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. Enchanted permanent has "Discard two artifact cards: Untap this permanent."

card.name: Pteron Ghost
card.text: Flying Sacrifice Pteron Ghost: Regenerate target artifact.

card.name: Pulse of the Dross
card.text: Target player reveals three cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card. Then if that player has more cards in hand than you, return Pulse of the Dross to its owner's hand.

card.name: Pulse of the Fields
card.text: You gain 4 life. Then if an opponent has more life than you, return Pulse of the Fields to its owner's hand.

card.name: Pulse of the Forge
card.text: Pulse of the Forge deals 4 damage to target player. Then if that player has more life than you, return Pulse of the Forge to its owner's hand.

card.name: Pulse of the Grid
card.text: Draw two cards, then discard a card. Then if an opponent has more cards in hand than you, return Pulse of the Grid to its owner's hand.

card.name: Pulse of the Tangle
card.text: Put a 3/3 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield. Then if an opponent controls more creatures than you, return Pulse of the Tangle to its owner's hand.

card.name: Purge
card.text: Destroy target artifact creature or black creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Quicksilver Behemoth
card.text: Affinity for artifacts When Quicksilver Behemoth attacks or blocks, return it to its owner's hand at end of combat.

card.name: Razor Golem
card.text: Affinity for Plains Vigilance

card.name: Reap and Sow
card.text: Choose one - Destroy target land; or search your library for a land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Entwine {1}{G}

card.name: Rebuking Ceremony
card.text: Put two target artifacts on top of their owners' libraries.

card.name: Reshape
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Reshape, sacrifice an artifact. Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Retract
card.text: Return all artifacts you control to their owner's hand.

card.name: Ritual of Restoration
card.text: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Roaring Slagwurm
card.text: Whenever Roaring Slagwurm attacks, tap all artifacts.

card.name: Savage Beating
Scavenging Scarab
card.text: Scavenging Scarab can't block.

card.name: Screams from Within
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1. When enchanted creature dies, return Screams from Within from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Scrounge
card.text: Target opponent chooses an artifact card in his or her graveyard. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Second Sight
card.text: Choose one - Look at the top five cards of target opponent's library, then put them back in any order; or look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order. Entwine {U}

card.name: Serum Powder
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. Any time you could mulligan and Serum Powder is in your hand, you may exile all the cards from your hand, then draw that many cards.

card.name: Shield of Kaldra
Shriveling Rot
card.text: Choose one - Until end of turn, whenever a creature is dealt damage, destroy it; or until end of turn, whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller loses life equal to its toughness. Entwine {2}{B}

card.name: Shunt
card.text: Change the target of target spell with a single target.

card.name: Skullclamp
Slobad, Goblin Tinkerer
card.text: Sacrifice an artifact: Target artifact gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Soulscour
card.text: Destroy all nonartifact permanents.

card.name: Spawning Pit
card.text: Sacrifice a creature: Put a charge counter on Spawning Pit. {1}, Remove two charge counters from Spawning Pit: Put a 2/2 colorless Spawn artifact creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Specter's Shroud
Spellbinder
Spincrusher
card.text: Whenever Spincrusher blocks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spincrusher: Spincrusher can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Spire Golem
card.text: Affinity for Islands Flying

card.name: Stand Together
card.text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature and two +1/+1 counters on another target creature.

card.name: Steelshaper Apprentice
card.text: {W}, {T}, Return Steelshaper Apprentice to its owner's hand: Search your library for an Equipment card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Stir the Pride
card.text: Choose one - Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn; or until end of turn, creatures you control gain "Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life." Entwine {1}{W}

card.name: Sundering Titan
card.text: When Sundering Titan enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, choose a land of each basic land type, then destroy those lands.

card.name: Surestrike Trident
card.text: Equipped creature has first strike and "{T}, Unattach Surestrike Trident: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target player." Equip {4}

card.name: Sword of Fire and Ice
Sword of Light and Shadow
Synod Artificer
card.text: {X}, {T}: Tap X target noncreature artifacts. {X}, {T}: Untap X target noncreature artifacts.

card.name: Talon of Pain
card.text: Whenever a source you control other than Talon of Pain deals damage to an opponent, put a charge counter on Talon of Pain. {X}, {T}, Remove X charge counters from Talon of Pain: Talon of Pain deals X damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Tangle Golem
card.text: Affinity for Forests

card.name: Tanglewalker
card.text: Each creature you control can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an artifact land.

card.name: Tears of Rage
card.text: Cast Tears of Rage only during the declare attackers step. Attacking creatures you control get +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures. Sacrifice those creatures at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Tel-Jilad Outrider
card.text: Protection from artifacts

card.name: Tel-Jilad Wolf
card.text: Whenever Tel-Jilad Wolf becomes blocked by an artifact creature, Tel-Jilad Wolf gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Test of Faith
card.text: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, and put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way.

card.name: Thought Dissector
card.text: {X}, {T}: Target opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until an artifact card or X cards are revealed, whichever comes first. If an artifact card is revealed this way, put it onto the battlefield under your control and sacrifice Thought Dissector. Put the rest of the revealed cards into that player's graveyard.

card.name: Thunderstaff
card.text: As long as Thunderstaff is untapped, if a creature would deal combat damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage. {2}, {T}: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Trinisphere
card.text: As long as Trinisphere is untapped, each spell that would cost less than three mana to cast costs three mana to cast.

card.name: Turn the Tables
card.text: All combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn is dealt to target attacking creature instead.

card.name: Unforge
card.text: Destroy target Equipment. If that Equipment was attached to a creature, Unforge deals 2 damage to that creature.

card.name: Ur-Golem's Eye
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Vedalken Engineer
card.text: {T}: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

card.name: Vex
card.text: Counter target spell. That spell's controller may draw a card.

card.name: Viridian Acolyte
card.text: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Viridian Zealot
card.text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Viridian Zealot: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Voltaic Construct
card.text: {2}: Untap target artifact creature.

card.name: Vulshok Morningstar
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2. Equip {2}

card.name: Vulshok War Boar
card.text: When Vulshok War Boar enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice an artifact.

card.name: Wand of the Elements
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice an Island: Put a 2/2 blue Elemental creature token with flying onto the battlefield. {T}, Sacrifice a Mountain: Put a 3/3 red Elemental creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Well of Lost Dreams
card.text: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {X}, where X is less than or equal to the amount of life you gained. If you do, draw X cards.

card.name: Whispersilk Cloak
card.text: Equipped creature can't be blocked and has shroud. Equip {2}

card.name: Wirefly Hive
card.text: {3}, {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, put a 2/2 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying named Wirefly onto the battlefield. If you lose the flip, destroy all permanents named Wirefly.

card.name: Wurm's Tooth
card.text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may gain 1 life.
